name: LOGistICAL
description: LOGistICAL is a strategy puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the country. The whole game is a huge puzzle while each town is its own little piece of puzzling. Plenty of towns are easy enough. LOGistICAL covers all of Australia.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256+MB with 1024x768 resolution Storage: 300 MB available space
